mapper.select: select * from project where cateCode=#{cateCode} and proCode=#{proCode}
select to_char(proOpen, 'YYYY-MM-DD') proOpen, to_char(proEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') proEnd, proDate ,proCode, cateCode from project where cateCode=#{cateCode} and proCode=#{proCode}
select proRefund from project where cateCode=#{cateCode} and proCode=#{proCode}
select userMail, userImg, replyContent, to_char(replyDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') replyDate, proCode from reply where proCode=#{proCode} order by replyNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(userMail, userImg, proCode, replyNo, replyContent, userIp, replyDate) values(#{userMail}, #{userImg}, #{proCode}, replySq.nextVal, #{replyContent}, #{userIp}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select member.userImg userImg, proCode, pay.userMail userMail, totalPrice, to_char(payDate,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') payDate from member,pay where proCode = #{proCode} and member.userMail=pay.userMail
select TRUNC(proEnd-sysdate) remainingDay, TRUNC((proNow/proGoal)*100) proGoalRate, proNow from project where proCode=#{proCode}
